text: Compromising Positions is a 1985 American mystery comedy movie directed by Frank Perry and was based on the 1978 novel by Susan Isaacs. It stars Susan Sarandon, Raul Julia, Mary Beth Hurt, Joe Mantegna, Edward Herrmann, Judith Ivey, Deborah Rush, Josh Mostel and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1985 comedy movies Category:1985 mystery movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American mystery movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Frank Perry Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in New York (state)
title: Compromising Positions
